text: Gemma Clair Collins (born 31 January 1981) is an English reality television star, media personality and businesswoman. She is known for her dramatic personality and is often referred to as "the GC". Collins became famous after appearing on The Only Way Is Essex. Collins was born in Romford. She was bullied in school. Collins left school at 16 and believed she would become famous. == Television appearances == In 2011, she began appearing on the ITVBe reality series The Only Way Is Essex, appearing until 2019. After becoming famous from appearing on The Only Way Is Essex, Collins appeared as a contestant on several reality shows including I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here, Celebrity Big Brother, Celebs Go Dating, MasterChef, Dancing on Ice and The Great British Bake-Off. Collins had her own reality show titled Gemma Collins: Diva. She also had a show named Self-Harm and Me, where she talked about her mental health. == Other ventures == She has also published a book titled The GC: How to be a Diva. Collins admitted to using a ghostwriter to write the book. Collins has also released a clothing line, a perfume, hand sanitizers and face masks. She has also had clothing deals with Boohoo.com and InTheStyle. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:English businesspeople Category:English television personalities Category:Living people Category:Reality television participants Category:Television personalities from Essex
title: Gemma Collins
